nodes.text: The Siltshift cantina, also known as the Rodian's Revenge, was a cantina located in the settlement of Mos Ila on the planet of Tatooine. Owned by a Rodian named Regg, the cantina had two levels, as well as entertainment and vendors. An example of this was the Astromechalla band that played there during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
